title: Chickpea & Veggie Tacos
description: High-protein vegetarian tacos with roasted chickpeas, sweet potatoes, and kale.
instructions: Toss chickpeas with oil, cumin, paprika, and salt. Roast at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes.
Warm tortillas. Mash or layer chickpeas, sweet potato, and kale.
Mix yogurt with lime juice and drizzle on top.
notes: Turn into bowls if preferred; add avocado or feta for extra richness.
